core_meaning: Square between Moon and Mars drives friction/work. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. Mars: drive, assertion, surgery, mechanics, conflict. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Public reception, brand sentiment, consistency.  Execution speed, competition, technical grit. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Bonding, nurturance, emotional safety.  Desire, boundaries, anger management. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Cyclic cashflow, consumer sentiment.  Risk-capital, decisive investments, initiative-led gains. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Hydration, sleep, digestion; stress sensitivity.  Inflammation, accidents; channel via training. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
Impulsive actions or accidents; channel energy into training.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; Mars: execute, train, assert; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Moon Square Mars
en.core: Square between Moon and Mars drives friction/work. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. Mars: drive, assertion, surgery, mechanics, conflict. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

hi.title: Moon Square Mars (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Moon और Mars का Square — ऊर्जा friction/work के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
